topic.title: Enabling DNS Proxy in NAT Mode

body.p: The NAT engine by default offers the same DNS servers to the guest that are configured on the host. In some scenarios, it can be appropriate to hide the DNS server IPs from the guest, for example when this information can change on the host due to expiring DHCP leases.
